For Enterprises

The Law Firm offers comprehensive legal services to entrepreneurs in the following specializations:

  • Civil law
  • Commercial law
  • Business law
  • Administrative law
  • Labor and social security law
  • Intellectual property law
  • Comprehensive support for investment projects

The Law Firm provides legal services in the above-stated range, which in particular includes the following fields of activities:

Civil Law

  • - preparation of all contracts in relation under civil law which also include professionally-oriented issues related to trade, investment, etc.
  • - conduct of court proceedings which are associated with contractual relations, especially the debt collection

Commercial Law

  • Establishment of commercial companies, including companies which are shared by the foreigners, in particular:
  • - drafting and negotiation of the articles of association
  • - preparation of any other documents which are required for the registration of the company
  • - representation in registry courts

Current full service for commercial companies includes in particular:

  • - preparation of the resolutions of company’s organization
  • - preparation of the minutes of the meetings held by the company’s organization
  • - drafting the regulations for the board of directors and the supervisory board
  • - drafting contracts with board members and proxies
  • - representation in court proceedings concerning, inter alia challenging the resolutions, the convening of the meetings of shareholders
  • - consolidations, restructuring and liquidation of commercial companies
  • - representation in arbitration proceedings and bankruptcy proceedings

Administrative Law

  • - Representation of entrepreneurs and other entities before the public bodies at the highest possible stage such as Minister of the Interior and Administration (authorization to acquire real estate by the foreigner), Minister of Treasury (competent for the public domain property), President of the Office of Competition and Consumer (business consolidations, the acquisition of the company) President of the Energy Regulatory Office (electricity trading license), The Patent Office of the Republic of Poland (application for the right to register a trademark, etc.)
  • - representation before the customs authorities
  • - representation before the construction/building supervision authorities (decisions on Land Development and Management Conditions, building permits)
  • - representation before the authorities of foreign exchange authorities (obtaining the foreign exchange authorization)
  • - representation before the Provincial (Voivodeship) Administrative Court and the Supreme Administrative Court

Labor and social security law

  • - drafting the employment contracts and management contracts
  • - drafting the non-competition agreements
  • - drafting the out-of-court settlement and agreements on employment relationships
  • - preparation of the work regulations, remuneration rules and other in-house normative acts
  • - participation in the negotiation and the negotiation on conclusion of Collective Bargaining
  • - representation of the entrepreneur or employee in employment tribunal proceedings
  • - representation before the bodies competent to issue the work permit (work permit for foreigners)

Protection of intellectual property

  • - copyright and related rights
  • - registration and trademark protection
  • - license agreements
  • - patent law

Support for investment projects

  • - the establishment of business entities
  • - acquisition of real estate property (including the authorization of Minister of the Interior and Administration)
  • - obtaining the administrative decisions essential for the conduct of the investment (eg building permit)
  • - preparation of all contracts and in-house documents which are related to the employment of workers
  • - drawing up general terms and conditions of contracts (GIC) for business entities, for example, general conditions of sale of goods and general conditions of service provision
